item.title: Playing the Parent vs Technology Game
item.description: Disclaimer Parenting is bursting with everyones opinions - this is yet another one of those and is merely based on my experience. So if any of this is useful, hooray! If not, feel free to roll your eyes and move along. Despite a childhood in New Zealand, my oldest has developed with bits of an american accent. This is the result of earlier formative years absorbing a glut of “curated” YouTube Kids videos.
